first_section.little_text: Track your calorie intake and energy expenditure

second_section.main_text: users are already eating properly!

third_section.little_text: Calories - is the unit of energy used for determining the amount of energy obtained from food and we use to support the vital processes of the body.
third_section.little_text_2: Calories are important for provision of energy, equired for operation organs, exercise and other daily activities activities

fourth_section.main_text: Why it is important to count calories?
fourth_section.little_text: Calorie counting is important for certain reasons.
fourth_section.little_text_2: FIRSTLY, it helps control weight and maintain a healthy level of fitness. A balanced amount of calories meets the needs of the body, avoiding overweight or malnutrition.
fourth_section.little_text_3: SECONDLY, calorie control can promote a healthy lifestyle and prevention of diseases. Excessive calorie intake can lead to the development of obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease and other health problems.

fifth_section.main_text: Are you ready to start?
